name: VR Lunar Base Skirmish: Control the Moon
name_original: VR Lunar Base Skirmish: Control the Moon
description:
This is a shooting survival game. Players need to pick up weapons to protect the moon base from being destroyed by the enemy, and kill waves of enemies. Players need to use their flexible positioning to ensure that they can survive the enemy. The army includes ordinary infantry, shotguns, and mortars, as well as air strikes, using excellent shooting techniques to annihilate invading enemy forces and defend the moon base.

Instructions:
Menu: handle menu key
Move: left handle arrow key
Fire: Right handle trigger
Direction: right handle position/right handle left and right
